code: import React from"react";import"./Card_dish.css";import shekel from"../../assets/icons/shekel-icon.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CardDish=function CardDish(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"card-dish ".concat(props.class),onClick:props.onClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"up-part-card-dish",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.src,alt:props.alt,className:"img-card-dish"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"name-card-dish",children:[props.name," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ingredients-card-dish",children:props.ingredients})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"hr-left"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:shekel,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"price-card-dish",children:props.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"hr-right"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"hr-mobile"})]})]});};export default CardDish;

sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import "./Card_dish.css" import {Iprops} from "../../interfaces" import shekel from "../../assets/icons/shekel-icon.svg" const CardDish: React.FC = (props:Iprops)=> { return ( ) } export default CardDish
